product_name: The North Face Better Than Naked Long Haul Shorts - Men's
long_description: Offering lots of pockets for food during for extra-long runs, The North Face Better Than Naked Long Haul Shorts for men keep you comfortable with smooth fabric and a supportive, quick-drying liner. Ripstop polyester is used to create soft and flowing outer shorts; panels add to their breathability. FlashDry(TM) fibers in liners dramatically improve dry time and breathability, and critical seams are constructed without seams for chafe-free comfort. Liners feature a high percentage of recycled fabric, and include a small pocket on each leg for energy gels or energy food (not included). Shaped waistband offers a supportive fit, and back of shorts offer multiple pockets for lots of energy food (not included). The North Face Better Than Naked Long Haul Shorts for men feature reflective logos to increase your visibility in low light.
short_description: Offering lots of pockets for food during for extra-long runs, The North Face Better Than Naked Long Haul Shorts for men keep you comfortable with smooth fabric and a supportive, quick-drying liner.
